channel.title: Congratz Clawz Fury! - Tutorial Author
channel.description: Congratulations! You know, it's kind of a big pressure when you get the reward. Some people start to change (I have noticed me change), and idk why (even though I have experienced it according to others). Let's just hope you don't 'change', you're already cool, just don't get it over your head.

item.title: Congratz Clawz Fury! - Tutorial Author
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Congrats, but I’m going to lock this thread now for obvious reasons.

Read full topic

item.title: Congratz Clawz Fury! - Tutorial Author
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

Jmood:

None, the badge is useless and has no meaning other then to make people feel like they’re now better then others. I can see the point in the Server Help badge, but the tutorial author is just worthless.

So you’re saying there’s no tutorial that doesn’t teach the basics of java that could be made to be worthy of a rank? Please stop. I don’t even have to make a tutorial to prove it, there’s plenty of examples.

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars


moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

You may argue that the second example is indirectly teaching inheritance, but the tutorial is more revolved around creating a good spell system for your server.

Saying the rank is worthless (especially on a thread congratulating someone for the rank) is extremely moronic… If you really feel its worthless go speak to an admin about it, no one here cares.

arham 4:

Have to consider my age

You’ve been doing this since you first joined man. You always got mad about how people would treat you differently for your age, and now you’re asking people to consider your age? lol its confusing, not to mention age has nothing to do with this…

But yeah as for the thread its pretty much done, thanks again to anyone that didn’t derail the thread. I’d like a moderator to lock this if its okay with Arham.

Read full topic

item.title: Congratz Clawz Fury! - Tutorial Author
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[quote=“Lil_Smok3r, post:38, topic:508239”]Congratz Clawz Two Tutorial Authors… One week. Wow I’m blown away. TBH, they should change the Pokemon of it >.>
It should be Gyarados or Shaymin…[/quote]

Lol.

[quote=“Miss Silabsoft, post:37, topic:508239”][quote author=arham 4 link=topic=626478.msg4260441#msg4260441 date=1363408351]
Damn, I’ve seen how this award has gone over my head. Let’s just hope Jason doesn’t change…
[/quote]

None, the badge is useless and has no meaning other then to make people feel like they’re now better then others. I can see the point in the Server Help badge, but the tutorial author is just worthless.

To everyone that suggested this stupid loveing award this is the reason it was turned down oh so manytimes. But i guess you need something to replace irc legend for the moparscapers ;D ;D ;D ;D ;D ;D :biggrin[/quote]

Lol.

[quote=“Jmood, post:27, topic:508239”][quote author=Clawz fury link=topic=626478.msg4260482#msg4260482 date=1363411508]

false award

???
[/quote]

I hardly consider the badge as anything meaningful, creating a bunch of ok tutorials on either the basics of a language or to show how to use such basic features of a language is a waste of a reason to give the badge out, the documentation is far superior and will provide the up most examples for a beginner to learn from.[/quote]

Have to consider my age

Read full topic

item.title: Congratz Clawz Fury! - Tutorial Author
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“Scape-JAVA, post:35, topic:508239”][quote author=Ruby link=topic=626478.msg4260654#msg4260654 date=1363427888]

Congratulations! It’s because of me you got it anyway. Well, me and Tom. :rolleyes:

Just to clear this up he was actually nominated by a completely different person than either of you two, Tom may have asked for your opinion on the matter but you were only there for feedback :P. In future don’t claim things like this because 9 times out of 10 it wouldn’t have been you. I would name the member who nominated him but I’m not sure if he wants to be recognised for it :o
[/quote]

It’s better not to reveal things like that, ruby.[/quote]
It’s not in breach of any guidelines and I never released any information, nothing wrong with it SJ my friend ;).

Read full topic
